name: Phrenos
goal: PHRENOS is a Brussels-based company specialised in the conception, development and management of a variety of projects, ranging from PR and social media focused strategies, to events, stakeholder campaigns and stand management.Our multi-language team has over 8 years of experience in managing and organising international projects, competitions and exhibitions, high-level events and summits with a results-driven and multicultural approach, on behalf of institutions such as the European Commission, the United Nation and other public institutions and clients.
interests: Communication, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Energy, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
European Development Days;
Lorenzo Natali Media Prize.
EU Cities for Fair and Ethical Trade Award 2018
